text: Johnny Johnny Yes Papa is a 2018 Indian Kannada action film directed and written by Preetham Gubbi.Preetham targets gen x in johnny johnny yes papa The New Indian Express (25 April 2017) The film is made under the Duniya Talkies banner owned by actor Duniya Vijay who also plays the lead role. The film is a sequel to their previous venture Johny Mera Naam Preethi Mera Kaam (2011).Ready for Johnny Johnny Yes Papa? The Times of India (14 April 2017) The rest of the principal cast include Rachita Ram, Rangayana Raghu and Sadhu Kokila.Rachitha Ram new padmavathi in Johny Johny Yes papa starring duniya vijay Kannada Matinee (October 2017) The film's soundtrack is composed by B. Ajaneesh Loknath. The first look teaser of the film was released on 19 January 2018 in YouTube.Johnny Johnny Yes Papa | Kannada First Look Teaser | Duniya Vijay, Rachitha Ram | Duniya Talkies Youtube.com (19 January 2018) The name of the film originates from the nursery rhyme Johny Johny Yes Papa. ==Cast== * Duniya Vijay as Johnny * Rachita Ram as Priya * Rangayana Raghu * Sadhu Kokila * Saiteja Salveru * Nagabhushan ==Reception== A review in the Deccan Herald criticised the film's screenwriting and Tabala Nani's dialogue, praising Vijay's "brilliant dialogue delivery" as the film's only consolation. ==Soundtrack== The film's soundtracks are composed by B. Ajaneesh Loknath. The music rights were acquired by Jio Music. ==References== ==External links== * * Johnny Johnny Yes Papa (2018) Category:Indian films Category:2010s Kannada- language films Category:2010s romantic action films Category:Indian romantic action films Category:Indian sequel films Category:Films shot in Bangalore Category:Films directed by Preetham Gubbi Category:Masala films
title: Johnny Johnny Yes Papa (film)
